DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate cardiovascular response ( blood pressure , heart rate , electrocardiographic response blood vessel reactivity response ) take Adderall healthy adult .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults 18 year age old 2 . Healthy subject without know cardiovascular disease , thyroid disease document mental health illness 3 . Subjects medication 4 . Subjects prior history regular amphetamine use , nonprescription stimulant 5 . Nonsmokers Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subjects know cardiovascular disease , thyroid disease 2 . Subjects history psychotic disorders/mental health illness , include limited anxiety , depression , bipolar disorder ; history substance abuse dependence 3 . Subjects currently take medication 4 . Prior history regular amphetamine use , nonprescription stimulant 5 . Smokers 6 . Pregnant subject 7 . Known lactose intolerance ( due presence lactose prepared medication ) 8 . Family history sudden cardiac death
